00034 BrisaServiceXMLHandler::BrisaServiceXMLHandler()

00037 BrisaServiceXMLHandler::~BrisaServiceXMLHandler()

00041 void BrisaServiceXMLHandler::parseService(BrisaAbstractService *service,
00042         QIODevice *scpd) {
00043 
00044     QDomDocument doc("service");
00045     doc.setContent(scpd);
00046     QDomElement element = doc.documentElement();
00047     if (element.tagName() != "scpd")
00048         return;
00049 
00050     QDomNode n = element.firstChild();
00051     while (!n.isNull()) {
00052         element = n.toElement();
00053         if (element.tagName() == "specVersion") {
00054             QString major = element.elementsByTagName("major").at(0).toElement().text();
00055             QString minor = element.elementsByTagName("minor").at(0).toElement().text();
00056             service->setAttribute(BrisaAbstractService::Major, major);
00057             service->setAttribute(BrisaAbstractService::Minor, minor);
00058         } else if (element.tagName() == "actionList") {
00059             QDomNodeList actionList = element.elementsByTagName("action");
00060             for (int i = 0; i < actionList.size(); i++) {
00061                 QString name = actionList.at(i).toElement().elementsByTagName("name").at(0).toElement().text();
00062                 BrisaAction *action;
00063                 if (service->getAction(name)) {
00064                     action = service->getAction(name);
00065                 } else {
00066                     action = new BrisaAction();
00067                     action->setName(name);
00068                 }
00069                 QDomNode argumentList = actionList.at(i).toElement().elementsByTagName("argumentList").at(0);
00070                 QDomNodeList arguments = argumentList.toElement().elementsByTagName("argument");
00071                 for (int i = 0; i < arguments.size(); i++) {
00072                     QString argumentName = arguments.at(i).toElement().elementsByTagName("name").at(0).toElement().text();
00073                     QString direction = arguments.at(i).toElement().elementsByTagName("direction").at(0).toElement().text();
00074                     QString relatedStateVariable = arguments.at(i).toElement().elementsByTagName("relatedStateVariable").at(0).toElement().text();
00075                     action->addArgument(argumentName, direction, relatedStateVariable);
00076                 }
00077                 service->addAction(action);
00078             }
00079         } else if (element.tagName() == "serviceStateTable") {
00080             QDomNodeList stateVariables = element.elementsByTagName("stateVariable");
00081             for (int i = 0; i < stateVariables.size(); i++) {
00082                 BrisaStateVariable *stateVariable = new BrisaStateVariable();
00083                 QString sendEvents = stateVariables.at(i).toElement().attribute("sendEvents");
00084                 QString multicast = stateVariables.at(i).toElement().attribute("multicast");
00085                 QString name = stateVariables.at(i).toElement().elementsByTagName("name").at(0).toElement().text();
00086                 QString dataType = stateVariables.at(i).toElement().elementsByTagName("dataType").at(0).toElement().text();
00087                 QString defaultValue = stateVariables.at(i).toElement().elementsByTagName("defaultValue").at(0).toElement().text();
00088                 stateVariable->setAttribute(BrisaStateVariable::SendEvents, sendEvents);
00089                 stateVariable->setAttribute(BrisaStateVariable::Multicast, multicast);
00090                 stateVariable->setAttribute(BrisaStateVariable::Name, name);
00091                 stateVariable->setAttribute(BrisaStateVariable::DataType, dataType);
00092                 stateVariable->setAttribute(BrisaStateVariable::DefaultValue, defaultValue);
00093                 QDomNode allowedValueList = stateVariables.at(i).toElement().elementsByTagName("allowedValueList").at(0);
00094                 QDomNodeList allowedValues = allowedValueList.toElement().elementsByTagName("allowedValue");
00095                 for (int j = 0; j < allowedValues.size(); j++)
00096                     stateVariable->addAllowedValue(allowedValues.at(j).toElement().text());
00097 
00098                 QDomNodeList allowedValueRange = stateVariables.at(i).toElement().elementsByTagName("allowedValueRange");
00099                 if (allowedValueRange.size() > 0) {
00100                     QString minimum = allowedValueRange.at(0).toElement().elementsByTagName("minimum").at(0).toElement().text();
00101                     QString maximum = allowedValueRange.at(0).toElement().elementsByTagName("maximum").at(0).toElement().text();
00102                     if (minimum.isEmpty() || maximum.isEmpty()) {
00103                         continue;
00104                     }
00105                     QString step = allowedValueRange.at(0).toElement().elementsByTagName("step").at(0).toElement().text();
00106                     stateVariable->setAttribute(BrisaStateVariable::Minimum, minimum);
00107                     stateVariable->setAttribute(BrisaStateVariable::Maximum, maximum);
00108                     if (!step.isEmpty())
00109                         stateVariable->setAttribute(BrisaStateVariable::Step, step);
00110                 }
00111                 service->addStateVariable(stateVariable);
00112             }
00113         } else
00114             return;
00115         n = n.nextSibling();
00116     }
00117 }
